name: Marvelist
description: A project made with HTML5, CSS & JavaScript. The objective is to practice JavaScript in a project for the [*Linguagem de Script*](https://github.com/ifpb/ls) course.  The data used is provided by Marvel. © 2014 Marvel Comics API. ## Inspiration (Inspiração) Inspired on Marvel Comics site. ## Prototypes (Protótipos) [Wireframes](https://github.com/Henrifrade/Marvelist/tree/master/wireframe) ## API Resources (Recursos da API) #### The Marvel Comics API can provide info about: * Characters * Comics * Creators * Events * Series * Stories
